0:
allow_anonymous true
autosave_interval 60
connection_messages false
listener 1883
per_listener_settings false
persistence true
persistence_location /data
sabnzbd, sabnzbd.default, sabnzbd.default.svc, sabnzbd.default.svc.cluster, sabnzbd.default.svc.cluster.local, sab.${SECRET_DOMAIN}

cd /app
pip install --no-cache-dir --target /tmp/packages -r requirements.txt
export PYTHONPATH="/tmp/packages:$PYTHONPATH"
python app.py
